item.title: Australian media misbehaves with Team India, spreads absurd lies about Ravindra Jadeja: Here's what actually happened - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Australian Media Misbehaves with Team India, Spreads Absurd Lies About Ravindra Jadeja

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: HT Sports

The article debunks false claims made by the Australian media regarding Ravindra Jadeja's press conference, where he was accused of refusing to answer questions in English. It provides a detailed clarification of the events, countering misleading statements and highlighting the rudeness displayed by some Australian journalists.

  • The Australian media falsely claimed that Jadeja refused to answer questions in English.
  • In reality, Jadeja answered questions in Hindi, as they were posed in that language.
  • Another claim suggested Jadeja had to leave for the team bus, which he never said.
  • The press conference was primarily for Indian media, which was communicated beforehand.
‚ÄúAt no stage did Jadeja refuse to answer in English.‚Äù

This controversy comes amidst growing tensions surrounding the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, now tied at 1-1, highlighting not just on-field rivalries but off-field frictions as well.

item.title: Pakistan slams US allegations on missile capabilities, warns against damaging bilateral ties - The Times of India
item.description:
Pakistan slams US allegations on missile capabilities, warns against damaging bilateral ties

Publication Date: Not provided | Source: Times of India

In response to recent allegations from the United States regarding its missile capabilities, Pakistan has issued a strong statement condemning the claims and warning that such accusations could harm bilateral ties.

  • Pakistan asserts that US allegations are unfounded and harmful.
  • The statement emphasizes the importance of maintaining strong relations with the US amid rising tensions.
  • Officials expressed concern over the implications of the accusations on regional stability.
‚ÄúWe urge the US to reassess its stance and avoid making statements that could jeopardize our long-standing partnership.‚Äù - Pakistani official

This situation underscores the delicate balance required in diplomatic relations, particularly in the context of defense and military perceptions.

item.title: Watch: Australian Media Baffled Over Ravindra Jadeja's Alleged Refusal To Answer Queries In English - News18
item.description:
Watch: Australian Media Baffled Over Ravindra Jadeja's Alleged Refusal To Answer Queries In English

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

The ongoing Border-Gavaskar Trophy is marked by another controversy as Ravindra Jadeja reportedly refused to answer questions in English during a press conference at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. This incident follows a similar, viral altercation involving Virat Kohli.

  • Ravindra Jadeja spoke in Hindi during the press conference, causing confusion among Australian journalists.
  • The media manager of Team India engaged in a confrontation with local journalists regarding Jadeja's language choices.
  • This incident is viewed in the context of the team dynamics and existing tensions between Indian and Australian media.
BREAKINGüö®The Australian media has unnecessarily targeted the Indian cricket team once again.

The controversy around language in press interactions highlights ongoing cultural tensions and expectations in international sports reporting.

item.title: Trouble For Ex-India Cricketer Robin Uthappa As Regional PF Commissioner Alleges Fraud, Seeks Arrest - News18
item.description:
Trouble For Ex-India Cricketer Robin Uthappa As Regional PF Commissioner Alleges Fraud, Seeks Arrest

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

Former India cricketer Robin Uthappa has been accused of failing to pay provident fund dues for employees of his company, Centaurus Lifestyle Brands Pvt Ltd., totaling Rs 23,36,602. A regional PF commissioner has requested his arrest.

  • Uthappa has reportedly not paid dues to employees.
  • The complaint was filed by the KR Puram branch's PF commissioner.
  • An arrest warrant has been sought under various acts related to tax recovery and provident fund violations.
  • Uthappa resides in Dubai, complicating the legal process.
  • A previous court ruling had stayed proceedings against Uthappa's apparel brand in a separate cheque bounce case.
"Uthappa was in violation of various sections of the Employees‚Äô Provident Funds & Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952."

This situation raises concerns about the legal obligations of business owners and the potential repercussions of failing to manage employee benefits properly.

item.title: 5 spectacular images of space captured by NASA - India.Com
item.description:
5 Spectacular Images of Space Captured by NASA

Publication Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: India.com

This article showcases stunning images of space captured by NASA, highlighting the breathtaking beauty and complexity of the universe.

  • Galactic wreckage in Stephan's Quintet showcases a collision of galaxies.
  • Hubble's 28th birthday features the colorful Lagoon Nebula.
  • The image of NGC 1275 highlights a magnetic monster captured by Hubble's Advanced Camera for Surveys.
  • A stunning backdrop of distant galaxies frames a runaway galaxy.
  • A unique view of the disk galaxy NGC 5866 is presented in an ACS image.
Thanks for reading! Next: 7 stunning cosmology photos captured by Hubble Space Telescope of NASA.

This captivating collection of images not only showcases NASA's advancements in space exploration but also inspires awe about our universe.

item.title: Aamir Khan told Kiran Rao one line from Laapataa Ladies, convincing her: ‚ÄòWas struggling as a Laapataa Lady myself‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kiran Rao remembers how she was like a Laapataa Lady before Aamir Khan told her one line from Laapataa Ladies

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Kiran Rao reflects on her journey as a filmmaker, recounting how Aamir Khan inspired her to take on her latest project, Laapataa Ladies, after a long struggle with finding the right story.

  • Laapataa Ladies is Kiran Rao‚Äôs second film after Dhobi Ghat, released 13 years prior.
  • The film received critical acclaim and was India‚Äôs entry for the Best International Feature Film at the Oscars.
  • Kiran shared that Aamir‚Äôs compelling description of the film inspired her to direct it.
  • She expressed enthusiasm about her next project, stating it won‚Äôt take another 13 years to announce.
‚ÄúThat one line was just so compelling that I was like, I want to do this, really badly.‚Äù - Kiran Rao

Kiran Rao's story showcases the influence of collaboration in filmmaking and her continued commitment to the industry.

item.title: Mahayuti Portfolio Announcement Live Updates: CM Fadnavis retains Home, Ajit holds on to Finance, Shinde gets urban development - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mahayuti Portfolio Announcement Live Updates

Date & Source: Published on [Insert Date Here] by The Indian Express

After multiple meetings and heavy negotiations, the Mahayuti alliance announced the cabinet portfolios for its ministers. Key allocations include the Home Ministry retained by CM Devendra Fadnavis, Urban Development for Eknath Shinde, and Finance for Ajit Pawar.

  • CM Devendra Fadnavis keeps the Home Ministry.
  • Eknath Shinde is assigned the Urban Development, Housing, and Public Works Ministry.
  • Ajit Pawar receives the Finance & Planning and State Excise portfolio.
  • The legislative assembly's winter session concluded with significant discussions and several bills passed.
‚ÄúThe portfolio distribution is likely to undergo heavy negotiations as several key ministers from the previous Mahayuti government have been dropped.‚Äù

This reshuffling comes amidst ongoing political dynamics in Maharashtra and sets the stage for upcoming legislative sessions.

item.title: 7 stunning cosmology photos captured by Hubble Space Telescope of NASA - India.com
item.description:
7 Stunning Cosmology Photos from Hubble Space Telescope

Publication Date: December 21, 2024

Source: India.com

This article showcases breathtaking images captured by NASA's Hubble Space Telescope, highlighting various celestial phenomena.

  • Celestial Fireworks:

    DEM L 190, known as LMC N49, is the brightest supernova remnant in the Large Magellanic Cloud, lying around 160,000 light-years from Earth.

  • Einstein Ring:

    GAL-CLUS-022058s is one of the largest and most complete Einstein rings discovered in the universe.

  • Fornax 2:

    A globular cluster in the dwarf galaxy Fornax, showcasing similarities to clusters found in the Milky Way.

  • Star Jets:

    A Herbig-Haro object named HH111 was captured by Hubble's Wide Field Camera 3.

  • Cosmic Discolights:

    An image of the galaxy cluster MACS J0717.5+3745, highlighting dark matter.

  • Dark Matter:

    The galaxy cluster Abell 383 shows the effects of dark matter mass bending light from distant objects.

  • Massive Gamma-ray Burst:

    Observations of gamma-ray burst GRB 190114C, first detected in January 2019.
"These observations from Hubble provide critical insights into the processes occurring in our universe, showcasing the beauty and complexity of cosmic events."

The photos captured by the Hubble Space Telescope not only deepen our understanding of the cosmos but also inspire awe at the wonders of the universe.

item.title: Maharashtra portfolios: Fadnavis keeps Home, Shinde Urban Development; Ajit gets Finance - The Hindu
item.description:
Maharashtra portfolios: Fadnavis keeps Home, Shinde Urban Development; Ajit gets Finance

Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis retains key portfolios while Deputy Chief Ministers Eknath Shinde and Ajit Pawar take on Urban Development and Finance, respectively.

  • Fadnavis retains Home, Law and Judiciary departments.
  • Shinde gets Urban Development along with Housing and Public Works.
  • Ajit Pawar continues with Finance and Planning, including State Excise.
  • Ministers reshuffled, with new opportunities for younger leaders.
‚ÄúYoung faces have been given an opportunity in this cabinet.‚Äù

This cabinet reshuffle aims to balance power among coalition partners, maintaining crucial departments and preparing for the upcoming BMC elections.

item.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Man City (21 Dec, 2024) Game Analysis - ESPN India
item.description:
Aston Villa 2-1 Man City Game Analysis

Publication Date: 21 Dec, 2024 | Source: ESPN (IN)

Aston Villa continued their strong performance in the Premier League with a 2-1 victory over Manchester City, marking City's ninth loss in 12 games across all competitions.

  • Goals from Jhon Dur√°n and Morgan Rogers secured the win for Villa.
  • Villa rose to fifth place in the league, while City dropped to sixth.
  • City's manager, Pep Guardiola, expressed optimism despite the team's struggles.
  • Jhon Dur√°n has now scored in three consecutive matches.
  • Phil Foden scored City's lone goal in stoppage time, but it was not enough.
"We are disappointed, it's not good enough," said City striker Erling Haaland.

This victory showcases Villa‚Äôs rise in the league and City‚Äôs ongoing challenges in a competitive season.

item.description:
Radhika Merchant Shines in a Chic Loro Piana Co-Ord Set At Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

Radhika Merchant made a stylish appearance at the Dhirubhai Ambani International School‚Äôs annual day celebration, showcasing a blend of luxury and casual elegance.

  • She wore a chambray blue co-ord set from Loro Piana including a button-down shirt priced at ‚Çπ1,32,556 and matching trousers priced at ‚Çπ1,22,406.
  • Accessories included an Herm√®s belt, Bolide crossbody bag, and Himalaya Niloticus Crocodile Oran sandals, completing her chic look.
  • The event featured a star-studded guest list with notable personalities like Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, and others.

‚ÄúWith her effortlessly chic co-ord set, Radhika showcased how to perfectly blend casual elegance with luxury.‚Äù

This event highlights the intersection of family, style, and celebration in the Ambani household.

item.title: GST council explains difference in tax rates between salted and caramel popcorn - Hindustan Times
item.description:
GST Council Clarifies Tax Rates for Salted and Caramel Popcorn

Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The GST Council has issued a clarification on the tax rates applicable to different types of popcorn, specifying that pre-packed salted popcorn will incur a lower tax rate than caramelized popcorn.

  • Pre-packed, labelled, ready-to-eat snacks are taxed at 12%.
  • Caramelized popcorn falls under a higher tax category at 18% due to its added sugar content.
  • The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) will release a circular to clarify these rules further.
  • Ready-to-eat popcorn not pre-packed has a 5% GST rate.
  • Black pepper and raisins supplied directly by farmers are exempt from GST.
‚ÄúSalted, caramelised, plain popcorn is being sold as namkeen in certain states. Caramelised popcorn comes with added sugar, so the treatment rate is different from namkeen.‚Äù - Nirmala Sitharaman

The GST Council continues to review other tax issues without making definitive decisions, highlighting ongoing discussions about the applicability of GST on food delivery services.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 17: Allu Arjun fights fresh allegations even as film mints over ‚Çπ1030 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 17: Allu Arjun fights fresh allegations even as film mints over ‚Çπ1030 crore

Date: Dec 21, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, generating over ‚Çπ1030 crore despite fresh allegations against lead actor Allu Arjun regarding a tragic incident at a film screening.

  • The film has grossed approximately ‚Çπ25.31 crore net on its third Saturday, totaling ‚Çπ1030.21 crore net in 17 days.
  • It earned ‚Çπ10.65 crore during its premiere and ‚Çπ164.25 crore on opening day.
  • Pushpa 2 broke records to become the highest-grossing film of 2024.
  • Fresh allegations against Allu Arjun stem from a stampede during a film event that resulted in tragic consequences.
  • Telangana CM and MLA have accused him of irresponsibility during the incident.
‚ÄúAccording to the information I have received...the film star turned to them, smiled and said, now the film will be a hit.‚Äù - MLA Akbaruddin Owaisi

Despite the controversy, Pushpa 2: The Rule's box office numbers indicate strong audience engagement and commercial success.

item.title: PM Modi meets 101-year-old ex-IFS officer in Kuwait after granddaughter's request - Hindustan Times
item.description:
PM Modi Meets 101-Year-Old Ex-IFS Officer in Kuwait Following Granddaughter's Request

Date: Dec 21, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Prime Minister Narendra Modi met a 101-year-old former Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officer in Kuwait after a request from his granddaughter made on social media.

  • PM Modi responded to a request from Mangal Sain Handa's granddaughter on platform X for a meeting during his visit.
  • This visit marks the first by an Indian PM to Kuwait in 43 years.
  • Mangal Sain Handa's son expressed gratitude for the meeting, describing it as an "experience of a lifetime."
  • Kuwait's Indian diaspora constitutes 21% of the population, with Indian workers making up 30% of the workforce.
‚ÄúWe deeply value the historical connection with Kuwait that has been nurtured over generations.‚Äù - PM Modi

This personal meeting highlights the relationship between India and Kuwait, especially within the context of a substantial Indian community in the Gulf state.

item.title: Ilness caused by respiratory viruses increases in USA - The Times of India
item.description:
Increased Respiratory Virus Illnesses in the USA

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: CDC Update

The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported a rise in illnesses caused by respiratory viruses, predicting further increases with the flu season approaching.

  • Healthcare visits for respiratory viruses are currently at moderate levels.
  • Hospitalizations are expected to be lower compared to last year.
  • COVID-19 and Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) are significantly affecting the population.
  • Recent data shows that influenza A constitutes nearly 97% of positive flu tests.
  • Louisiana and Oregon are reporting high flu case numbers.
  • Of 1,20,000 hospital admissions since October, 72,000 were COVID-related, with 8,200 deaths.
‚ÄúIf a new variant of COVID does not emerge, the burden in hospitals will lower especially during the holiday season.‚Äù

The rise in respiratory illnesses highlights the need for continued vigilance as the flu season intensifies and COVID-19 remains a concern.

item.description:
Abhijeet Bhattacharya says Shah Rukh Khan has a different class while dismissing Salman Khan: 'Road par kutte ki tarah so rahe ho, to ek daarubaaz aayega, ek tharki...'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In a recent statement, singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya highlighted the distinction between actors Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan, expressing his admiration for Khan's prowess while dismissing Khan with a metaphorical critique.

  • Abhijeet Bhattacharya commented on Shah Rukh Khan's class.
  • He used a stark metaphor to describe Salman Khan's situation.
  • The statement has sparked conversations among fans and media.
'Road par kutte ki tarah so rahe ho, to ek daarubaaz aayega, ek tharki...'

This statement underscores the competitive nature of the Bollywood industry and reflects the fans' polarized views towards these iconic figures.

item.title: Manchester City suffer another defeat, pressure mounts on Pep Guardiola as Aston Villa win 2-1 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aston Villa edges Manchester City 2-1, increasing pressure on Pep Guardiola

Date: Dec 21, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Aston Villa inflicted further defeat on Manchester City with a 2-1 victory, as Villa moved to fifth in the Premier League while City struggles in sixth.

  • Aston Villa scored two goals from Jhon Duran and Morgan Rogers.
  • Manchester City has now lost nine out of their last twelve matches across all competitions.
  • Phil Foden managed to score for City in stoppage time, salvaging a late goal.
  • City's defense faltered again, conceding the opening goal for the ninth time this season.
‚ÄúIt's not good enough,‚Äù - City striker Erling Haaland.

This defeat puts Pep Guardiola's future at the club under scrutiny as Manchester City's poor form continues.

item.title: Maharashtra portfolio allocation: CM Fadnavis keeps home ministry, Ajit Pawar gets finance, Shinde gets u - The Times of India
item.description:
Maharashtra portfolio allocation: CM Fadnavis keeps home ministry, Ajit Pawar gets finance, Shinde gets urban development

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The Maharashtra government has announced new ministerial portfolios, with Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis retaining the home ministry. Ajit Pawar has been assigned finance, while Eknath Shinde will oversee urban development.

  • Devendra Fadnavis retains control over the home ministry.
  • Ajit Pawar has been appointed as the finance minister.
  • Eknath Shinde is now responsible for urban development.
"These allocations are intended to enhance governance and address pressing issues in each department." - Government Spokesperson

This reshuffle aims to strengthen the operational efficiency of the Maharashtra government.

item.title: Maharashtra portfolio allocation: Devendra Fadnavis keeps home, Eknath Shinde gets urban development - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Maharashtra portfolio allocation: Devendra Fadnavis keeps home, Eknath Shinde gets urban development

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Maharashtra government has finalized the cabinet portfolios, with Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis retaining the pivotal home ministry and Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde receiving urban development.

  • Fadnavis prioritizes the home ministry.
  • Shinde receives urban development and public works.
  • Ajit Pawar will oversee the finance department.
  • Dadaji Bhuse takes over as school education minister.
  • Chandrashekhar Bawankule appointed to the revenue department.
  • Portfolio allocation delayed, leading to speculation of discord within the alliance.
‚ÄúThis session was just a formality,‚Äù - Ambadas Danve, Leader of the opposition

This cabinet allocation follows significant electoral success for the BJP-Shiv Sena-NCP alliance in Maharashtra, overcoming prior political drama regarding leadership roles.
